verses.text: So king Solomon was king over all Israel.
And these \add were\add* the princes which he had; Azariah the son of Zadok the priest ,\f + \fr 4.2 \ft priest: or, chief officer\f*
Elihoreph and Ahiah , the sons of Shisha , scribes ; Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud , the recorder.\f + \fr 4.3 \ft scribes: or, secretaries\f*\f + \fr 4.3 \ft recorder: or, remembrancer\f*
And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada \add was\add* over the host : and Zadok and Abiathar \add were\add* the priests :
And Azariah the son of Nathan \add was\add* over the officers : and Zabud the son of Nathan \add was\add* principal officer , \add and\add* the king’s friend :
And Ahishar \add was\add* over the household : and Adoniram the son of Abda \add was\add* over the tribute.\f + \fr 4.6 \ft tribute: or, levy\f* \p
¶ And Solomon had twelve officers over all Israel , which provided victuals for the king and his household : each man his month in a year made provision.
And these \add are\add* their names : The son of Hur , in mount Ephraim :\f + \fr 4.8 \ft The son…: or, Ben-hur\f*
The son of Dekar , in Makaz , and in Shaalbim , and Beth-shemesh , and Elon-beth-hanan :\f + \fr 4.9 \ft The son…: or, Ben-dekar\f*
The son of Hesed , in Aruboth ; to him \add pertained\add* Sochoh , and all the land of Hepher :\f + \fr 4.10 \ft The son…: or, Ben-hesed\f*
The son of Abinadab , in all the region of Dor ; which had Taphath the daughter of Solomon to wife :\f + \fr 4.11 \ft The son…: or, Ben-abinadab\f*

Baana the son of Ahilud ; \add to him pertained\add* Taanach and Megiddo , and all Beth-shean , which \add is\add* by Zartanah beneath Jezreel , from Beth-shean to Abel-meholah , \add even\add* unto \add the place that is\add* beyond Jokneam :

The son of Geber , in Ramoth-gilead ; to him \add pertained\add* the towns of Jair the son of Manasseh , which \add are\add* in Gilead ; to him \add also pertained\add* the region of Argob , which \add is\add* in Bashan , threescore great cities with walls and brasen bars :\f + \fr 4.13 \ft The son…: or, Ben-geber\f*
Ahinadab the son of Iddo \add had\add* Mahanaim :\f + \fr 4.14 \ft Mahanaim: or, to Mahanaim\f*
Ahimaaz \add was\add* in Naphtali ; he also took Basmath the daughter of Solomon to wife :
Baanah the son of Hushai \add was\add* in Asher and in Aloth :
Jehoshaphat the son of Paruah , in Issachar :
Shimei the son of Elah , in Benjamin :

Geber the son of Uri \add was\add* in the country of Gilead , \add in\add* the country of Sihon king of the Amorites , and of Og king of Bashan ; and \add he was\add* the only officer which \add was\add* in the land. \p
¶ Judah and Israel \add were\add* many , as the sand which \add is\add* by the sea in multitude , eating and drinking , and making merry.
And Solomon reigned over all kingdoms from the river unto the land of the Philistines , and unto the border of Egypt : they brought presents , and served Solomon all the days of his life. \p
¶ And Solomon’s provision for one day was thirty measures of fine flour , and threescore measures of meal ,\f + \fr 4.22 \ft provision: Heb. bread\f*\f + \fr 4.22 \ft measures: Heb. cors\f*
Ten fat oxen , and twenty oxen out of the pastures , and an hundred sheep , beside harts , and roebucks , and fallowdeer , and fatted fowl.
For he had dominion over all \add the region\add* on this side the river , from Tiphsah even to Azzah , over all the kings on this side the river : and he had peace on all sides round about him.
And Judah and Israel dwelt safely , every man under his vine and under his fig tree , from Dan even to Beer-sheba , all the days of Solomon.\f + \fr 4.25 \ft safely: Heb. confidently\f* \p
¶ And Solomon had forty thousand stalls of horses for his chariots , and twelve thousand horsemen.
And those officers provided victual for king Solomon , and for all that came unto king Solomon’s table , every man in his month : they lacked nothing.

Barley also and straw for the horses and dromedaries brought they unto the place where \add the officers\add* were, every man according to his charge.\f + \fr 4.28 \ft dromedaries: or, mules, or, swift beasts\f* \p
¶ And God gave Solomon wisdom and understanding exceeding much , and largeness of heart , even as the sand that \add is\add* on the sea shore.
And Solomon’s wisdom excelled the wisdom of all the children of the east country , and all the wisdom of Egypt.
For he was wiser than all men ; than Ethan the Ezrahite , and Heman , and Chalcol , and Darda , the sons of Mahol : and his fame was in all nations round about.
And he spake three thousand proverbs : and his songs were a thousand and five.

And he spake of trees , from the cedar tree that \add is\add* in Lebanon even unto the hyssop that springeth out of the wall : he spake also of beasts , and of fowl , and of creeping things , and of fishes.
And there came of all people to hear the wisdom of Solomon , from all kings of the earth , which had heard of his wisdom.
